original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosalesu addhānamaggappaṭipanno hoti āyasmatā nāgasamālena pacchāsamaṇena.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā kosalesu addhāna magga paṭipannaḥ hoti āyasmatā nāgasamālena pacchāsamaṇena

original: Addasā kho āyasmā nāgasamālo antarāmagge dvidhāpathaṁ.
analyzed: addasā kho āyasmā nāga samālaḥ antarāmagge

original: Evaṁ vutte, bhagavā āyasmantaṁ nāgasamālaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte bhagavān āyasmantam nāgasamālam etat avoca

original: tatiyampi kho āyasmā nāgasamālo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: tatiyam pi khalu āyasmā nāgasamālaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: Tatiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ nāgasamālaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: tatiyam pi khalu bhagavān āyasmantam nāgasamālam etat avoca

original: Atha kho āyasmā nāgasamālo bhagavato pattacīvaraṁ tattheva chamāyaṁ nikkhipitvā pakkāmi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā nāgasamālaḥ bhagavato patta cīvaram tattha iva chamāyam nikkhipitvā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho āyasmato nāgasamālassa tena panthena gacchantassa antarāmagge corā nikkhamitvā hatthehi ca pādehi ca ākoṭesuṁ pattañca bhindiṁsu saṅghāṭiñca vipphālesuṁ.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmataḥ nāga samālassa tena panthena gacchantassa antarāmagge corāḥ nikkhamitvā hatthehi ca pādehi ca ākoṭesum pattam ca bhindisu saṅghāṭiñca vipphālesu

original: Atha kho āyasmā nāgasamālo bhinnena pattena vipphālitāya saṅghāṭiyā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā nāga samālaḥ bhinnena pattena vipphālitāya saṅghāṭiyā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā nāgasamālo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: eka mantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmā nāgasamālaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “idha mayhaṁ, bhante, tena panthena gacchantassa antarāmagge corā nikkhamitvā hatthehi ca pādehi ca ākoṭesuṁ, pattañca bhindiṁsu, saṅghāṭiñca vipphālesun”ti.
analyzed: idha bhante tena panthena gacchantassa antarāmagge corāḥ nikkhamitvā hatthehi ca pādehi ca ākoṭesu pattam ca bhindisu saṅghāṭiñca vipphālesunti

original: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etam attham viditvā tāyam velāyam imam udānam udānesi
